commandDescription.en-US: Tells you what are the features I offer
commandDescription.fr: Te dit quelles sont les fonctionnalités que je propose
commandDescription.pt-BR: Te diz quais recursos eu apresento

help.en-US: Type `/$<commandName>` to know what are the features I offer
help.fr: Tape `/$<commandName>` pour savoir quelles sont les fonctionnalités que je propose
help.pt-BR: Digite `/$<commandName>` pra saber quais são os recursos que apresento

reply.en-US:
Hey $<user>, there you are!
I can give you some advice about the server:
$<featureList>
reply.fr:
Ah $<user>, tu es là !
Je peux te donner des conseils sur le serveur :
$<featureList>
reply.pt-BR:
Opa $<user>, aí está você!
Eu posso te dar algumas dicas sobre o servidor:
$<featureList>
